00011 #ifndef _XVGROUPTRACKER_H_
00012 #define _XVGROUPTRACKER_H_
00013 
00014 #define DEFAULT_ITERATIONS 1
00015 
00016 #include <XVInteractive.h>
00017 #include <XVDrawable.h>
00018 #include <XVException.h>
00019 #include <XVFeature.h>
00020 
00021 #include <vector>
00022 
00036 template <class SRCTYPE, class FEATURETYPE>
00037 class XVGroupTracker {
00038 
00039  protected:
00040   
00041   SRCTYPE & source;
00042   vector<FEATURETYPE *> features;
00043 
00044   int stepsPerFrame;
00045   int frameNum;
00046 
00047  public:
00048 
00049   typedef typename FEATURETYPE::STATE STATE;
00050 
00051   XVGroupTracker(SRCTYPE & s, FEATURETYPE & f, int pf = DEFAULT_ITERATIONS) 
00052     : source(s), stepsPerFrame(pf), frameNum(0) { features.push_back(&f); };
00053 
00054   virtual vector<STATE > init(vector<STATE > & initStates) { 
00055     for(int i = 0; i < initStates.size(); ++i){
00056       features[i]->initState(initStates[i]);
00057     }
00058     return initStates;
00059   }
00060 
00061   virtual void track() throw (XVTrackerException);
00062   virtual vector<STATE > nextState() 
00063     throw (XVTrackerException);
00064 
00065   void addFeature(FEATURETYPE & f){ features.push_back(&f); };
00066   void removeFeature(int i){ delete features[i]; features.erase(features.begin() + i); };
00067   vector<FEATURETYPE *> & getFeatures(){ return features; };
00068 };
00069 
00089 template <class SRCTYPE, class WINTYPE, class FEATURETYPE>
00090 class XVDisplayGroupTracker : public XVGroupTracker<SRCTYPE, FEATURETYPE> {
00091  protected:
00092   using XVGroupTracker<SRCTYPE,FEATURETYPE>::source ;
00093   using XVGroupTracker<SRCTYPE,FEATURETYPE>::features ;
00094   using XVGroupTracker<SRCTYPE,FEATURETYPE>::stepsPerFrame ;
00095 
00096 
00097  protected:
00098 
00099   WINTYPE & window;
00100 
00101  public:
00102 
00103   typedef typename FEATURETYPE::STATE STATE;
00104 
00105   XVDisplayGroupTracker(SRCTYPE & s, WINTYPE & w, 
00106                FEATURETYPE & f, int pf = DEFAULT_ITERATIONS) 
00107     : XVGroupTracker<SRCTYPE, FEATURETYPE>(s, f, pf), window(w) {}
00108 
00109   virtual vector<STATE > init();
00110   virtual vector<STATE> init(XVSize &);
00111   virtual void track() throw (XVTrackerException);
00112   virtual vector<STATE > nextState() 
00113     throw (XVTrackerException);
00114 };
